author: AP
title: US midfielder Adams ruing virus-enforced 'whirlwind' break
description: United States midfielder Tyler Adams picked the wrong time to be the fittest he’s been all season
content:
BERLIN (AP) — United States midfielder Tyler Adams picked the wrong time to be the fittest he’s been all season.
With the Bundesliga suspended indefinitely due to the coronavirus outbreak, Adams is unsure when he will be able to play a competitive game for L… [+3407 chars]
